howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step1Description: You’re at a bar, festival, club. You open the app and see who else is here.
howItWorks.step2Description: Someone catches your eye. You ping them — if they ping back, it’s a match.
howItWorks.step3Description: Once you connect, take it offline. You chat, grab a drink, maybe more — the kind that doesn’t start with a swipe.

facts.fact1: ✔️ No staring contests across the bar

story.heading: Ever liked someone at a bar but never talked to them? What a waste, right?
